description.value: This orc is corrupted in the womb using dark, abyssal magic. The blood of this orc is a dark, viscous ichor. Alchemists, summoners and demonologists have uses for this blood. Use: A creature may use an action to drink a vial of this blood. For the next minute, the creature deals an extra 1d10 damage when it hits with a melee attack. This ability does not work for elves and half-elves.
